name: Acetone
description: Common solvent used in laboratory cleaning and sample preparation.
storage: Store in a flammable cabinet away from oxidizers.

name: Ethanol
description: Versatile solvent and disinfectant with broad laboratory applications.
storage: Keep tightly closed in a flammable storage area.

name: Sodium Chloride
description: Inorganic salt commonly used for buffer preparation and ionic strength control.
storage: Store at room temperature in a dry area.

name: Hydrochloric Acid
description: Strong mineral acid used for pH adjustment and cleaning glassware.
storage: Store in corrosion-resistant containers within a ventilated acid cabinet.

name: Sodium Hydroxide
description: Strong base used for titrations, saponification, and neutralization reactions.
storage: Store in airtight containers away from acids and moisture.
